name: Tag (Ranveer42)
description: This is just a normal game of tag. One person is it and only have a limited amount of time to tag somebody. If they tag someone before time runs out, they lose a life but if the person that is it and if they run out of time, they lose a life. THis goes on until the last person standing wins! Here is the link to the official game on Microsoft MakeCode Arcade. (https://arcade.makecode.com/S75382-51089-35020-25938)
